english_example_sentence: If you had waited for the fast train, you would have reached the city earlier.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты подождал быстрый поезд, ты бы приехал в город раньше.
turkish_example_sentence: Hızlı treni bekleseydin, şehre daha erken ulaşırdın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Hızlı treni ______, şehre daha erken ulaşırdın.
